quizDescription.text: The following is the schema for today's module

Movie-Rating Database
Movie ( mID, title, year, director )
Description: There is a movie with ID number mID, a title, a release year, and a director.

Reviewer ( rID, name )
Description: The reviewer with ID number rID has a certain name.

Rating ( rID, mID, stars, ratingDate )
Description: The reviewer rID gave the movie mID a number of stars rating (1-5) on a certain ratingDate.

Create a database named movie-rating and dump the below given file in to your database.
Note: you need to submit your query for the upcoming assignments
